Content:: Giancarlo Bellini (born 15 September 1945 in Crosa) is an Italian former road bicycle racer who won the mountains classification in the 1976 Tour de France.[1][2] He also won a stage in the 1978 Giro d'Italia.  This biographical article related to an Italian cycling person born in the 1940s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
